Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to process a purchase order from requisition to approval.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.FORMULA: Average Time from Purchase Order Creation to Purchase Order Completion

Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.EXPLANATION: Percentage of purchase orders processed without errors or inaccuracies.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Purchase Orders / Total Number of Purchase Orders) * 100

Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.KPIS: Number of purchase orders processed per month.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.EXPLANATION: Total number of purchase orders processed within a calendar month.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.FORMULA: Total Count of Purchase Orders Processed Each Month

Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.KPIS: Percentage of purchase orders with on-time delivery.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.EXPLANATION: Percentage of purchase orders delivered within the agreed-upon timeframe.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.FORMULA: (Number of Purchase Orders Delivered On Time / Total Number of Purchase Orders) * 100

Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.EXPLANATION: Average time taken for purchase order approval from submission to approval.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.FORMULA: Average Time from Purchase Order Submission to Purchase Order Approval

Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.EXPLANATION: Variation in lead times compared to the standard or expected lead time for purchase orders.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.FORMULA: (Actual Purchase Order Lead Time - Expected Purchase Order Lead Time) / Expected Purchase Order Lead Time * 100

Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for processing each purchase order, including administrative and operational costs.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.FORMULA: Total Cost of Processing Purchase Orders / Total Number of Purchase Orders Processed

Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.EXPLANATION: Percentage of purchase orders canceled against the total number of purchase orders processed.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Purchase Order.FORMULA: (Number of Purchase Orders Cancelled / Total Number of Purchase Orders) * 100
